oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Samuel Bratcher, Civil War veteran
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Copy print of Samuel Bratcher, who served in C. G, 35th Tenn. Inf. (5th Tenn. Rgt. Provisional Army, Mountain Rifle Rgt." He mustered in at McMinnville, Tenn. Taken sick around Chattanooga June 1863. Marked as being captured on Missionary Ridge, Nov. 26, 1863 and sent first to Louisville, KY. And on to Rock Island Prison, Ill. Released on March 19, 1865. Description: Fair complexion, black hair, hazel eyes, 5' 6", age 39.
